verses.roman:
sei govardhanera putra--raghunātha dāsa
bālya-kāla haite teṅho viṣaye udāsa

synonyms: sei—that; govardhanera putra—son of Govardhana Majumadāra; raghunātha dāsa—Raghunātha dāsa; bālya-kāla haite—from his very childhood; teṅho—he; viṣaye udāsa—indifferent to material happiness.
translation: Raghunātha dāsa was the son of Govardhana Majumadāra. From childhood, he was uninterested in material enjoyment.
